meanings.definition: The process of removing syntactic sugar from code.
meanings.sent1: Desugaring can make code easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: Developers often use desugaring to clean up their code.
meanings.sent3: I tried desugaring my essay to make it more straightforward.
meanings.sent4: Her desugaring of the recipe revealed the essential ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The desugaring of the novel stripped away unnecessary details.

meanings.definition: The act of simplifying complex code by breaking it down into its basic components.
meanings.sent1: Understanding desugaring is crucial for software development.
meanings.sent2: The desugaring process can make programming less daunting.
meanings.sent3: I attempted desugaring my closet by organizing it into sections.
meanings.sent4: His desugaring of the math problem made it much easier to solve.
meanings.sent5: The desugaring of the painting highlighted its simple beauty.
